body:
Today I hit 365 collective days as a staff member on Avicus.

3x Moderator; 2x Referee throughout the course of around 2 years

I also turn 19 today, I joined this community when I was 16..how time flies.

I've made many good friends and have learnt a lot over the past near 3 years on this server. Through all the ups and downs I appreciate it all.

Thanks for letting me stick around guys, it's been real fun.

Here's to many more memories!

-Snow 


I guess this doubles as an ama too :P
